Class Cell

java.lang.Object
  Cell
public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object

A class representing a cell. The cell class contains the arrays for the Molecules in the cell, the cell volume, and how the transcribing polymerases interact on the DNA. Also includes the pointers to the DNA/phage that are entering or currently in the cell.

See Also:
Molecule, Phage

Constructor Summary
Cell(TabascoSimulator mysim)
          Creates an empty Cell structure.
 
Method Summary
 long[] resetTranscriptionEvents()
          Resets the counter on the number of transcription events that have taken place for each polymerase.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

Cell

public Cell(TabascoSimulator mysim)
     throws java.io.IOException
Creates an empty Cell structure. In order to fill the contents of this class, the TabascoXML.fillCell() method needs to be invoked.

Parameters:
mysim - The pointer to the simulator that this cell resides in.
See Also:
TabascoXML#fillCell()
Method Detail

resetTranscriptionEvents

public long[] resetTranscriptionEvents()
Resets the counter on the number of transcription events that have taken place for each polymerase.

Returns:
a vector containing the number of transcription elongation events that have occured since the method was last invoked
